name: Ninja Ninja Runner
description:
Everything exists in a parallel universe, and you are facing a horizon paradox as your actions in the present universe have an impact on your duplicate self in the parallel. Avoid a multi-universal takeover by the evil cyborgs as you race to victory! Run, jump, slide, and dash to your destination while achieving your mission to reach infinite triumph.

Designed and Developed by:

Paperboy Games & ZapMil LLC
